Name: C# Runtime
Author: contact@tnsstudio.net
InstallScript:
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python3-dev python3-pip libtool

echo -e "updating npm. please wait..."
npm install npm@latest --location=global

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Installing nodejs packages"
if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production
fi

echo -e "NodeJS is now ready"
exit 0

Variables.Description: The main project file if multiple are present

Variables.DisplayName: The location of where the .csproj file is located. not the .sln file!
